data.message:
Hey, I have a question about Facebook Lite. Could you, please, add time, when a message has been seen? And which one?
For example - I sent two messages to my friend. He saw first one (I want to know, when), but has not seen the other one yet. 
It is possible on Facebook by browser, would be cool, if by Facebook Lite too.

replies.message: Thanks for the feedback, Agnieszka! We listen to all the feedback we get from the Facebook community. If you have any suggestions, we'd love to hear from you: on.fb.me/1N2bhYs. -Brittany
